channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This Fed has its head in the sand’ — but at least now we know where to invest
item.description: Worrisome housing and job markets suggest that the central bank should have cut interest rates more.

item.title: ‘I cannot plan a life with all the uncertainties’: My boyfriend, 54, has $90,000 in credit-card debt. Is this a dealbreaker?
item.description: “I’m on track to retire in 10 years.”

item.title: I’m 88 and leaving my $450,000 estate to my son who has children. Is that wrong?
item.description: “My other children have relationships, but they are unmarried and have no children.”

item.title: Billionaire David Tepper is feeling ‘miserable’ about stocks, but won’t ‘fight the Fed’
item.description: Hedge-fund investor Tepper expects the stock market rally to continue with a few Federal Reserve rate cuts, but sees danger in too many

item.title: Quantum stocks are hot again. Here’s what’s behind their explosive rally.
item.description: Shares of quantum-computing companies like D-Wave and IonQ are soaring this week as a flurry of positive news boosts investor enthusiasm for the emerg...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
